parameters: Welcome to my bar, want something to drink?
\P[1], you are too young for alcohol.\|
Come on, it’s not the first time we’ve had this, right?\|
We’ve all had some of Luby’s special wine before.
Come on, it’s not the first time we’ve had this, right?\|
We’ve all had some of Luby’s special wine before.
Come on, it’s not the first time we’ve had this, right?\|
We’ve all had some of Luby’s special wine before.
Haven't I told you that Luby's 'wine' doesn't contain any alcohol?
We don't have that much fairy mass with us now.
We don't have that much fairy mass with us now.
Is there anything else you want?
That couple over there—what’s their story? \|
They don’t seem like the usual travelers.
Aye, they came to town about a month ago.\|
Claimed to be the rightful owners of the castle up north.
They said a beast overtook it, fierce and cunning. \|
And they have sent more than a few adventurers to reclaim it,
It’s like the castle swallows them whole.
Castle, Beast... I know a story about those elements.
Castle, Beast... I know a story about those elements.
Castle, Beast... I know a story about those elements.
You mean Beuaty and the Beast?
The key elements fits the story, but I never heard there is another
Well, we better talk to the couple for more info.
This roast Pig is just awesome!.
Just finish your meal, we are in hurry.
It have been weeks after Jason and Jack depart.\|
And still not a sigle word about them yet.
Excuse us, we have overhear your conversation.
\|You mentioned a beast that’s taken over your castle?
Excuse us, we have overhear your conversation.
\|You mentioned a beast that’s taken over your castle?
Excuse us, we have overhear your conversation.
\|You mentioned a beast that’s taken over your castle?
\.That beast has claimed my throne and turned my home into a nightmare.
\|I sent brave adventurers to reclaim it, but not one has returned.
How do we know you’re not just trying to people to their doom?
We’re not here to deceive anyone!
\!The beast... it’s real and dangerous. You must believe us!
But why should we trust you?
We’ve heard that you are tricking people into feeding the beast.
Those are just rumors! We came to this town to seek help, not conspire.
\|If we wanted to deceive, why would we be sitting here, exposed?
You claim to be the rightful owners of the castle.\|
This pendant belonged to my family. \|
And you will see it on the castle.\.
There are still some of mine servant fighting the beast in the castle.
Your servant?\. How did they survied from the beast?
Well, my family have some sort of unsually power to possessed object.
As long as the catsle exist, those servant will keep revive.
But some how that beast could use that power too.\|
You will see my soilders as while and its as black.
We will advanture to the castles, and see if we can banish that Beast.
Thank you, we will provide any help we can provide to assist you.
What else you want to know?
Where did the Beast come from
Where did the Beast come from
As I mentioned, I used to has the power to enchant objects with magic.
That magic originally came from an ancient curse.
It was a curse that could transform living beings into something else,
a curse that we believed had been broken long ago.
Once the curse was lifted, its power was bound into a magic rose,
a rose capable of imbuing objects with life.
For years, the rose served us well, but recently, something went wrong.
It spiraled out of control, and many of my servants turned against me.
The rose itself twisted and became the Beast.
The castle is no longer the place it once was.
Now, the servants have been split into two factions.
One group serves the Beast, acting under its chaotic influence and
The other group remains loyal to me, bound by the last command
to drive out any intruders and protect the castle at all costs.
Unfortunately, that means even those loyal to me now see anyone
With no way to change their orders and the Beast’s growing power,\.
the castle has become a battleground,\.
with both sides attacking anything they perceive as dangerous.
Navigating it is perilous, as trust is fragile and
even my allies might turn against you.
\|I was once a prince, though I took the crown far too early.
My father died when I was just a boy,
\.leaving the kingdom and its burdens to my mother and me.
Desperate to protect the castle and our family,
\.my mother sought the aid of a powerful enchantress.
She cast an enchantment, making the castle unreachable
But that enchantress's favor came at a price.
\.One day, enraged by something unknown, she cursed me.
The curse left me trapped in a twisted existence,
\.my fate bound to a dark power.
Belle, my wife and the daughter of a merchant, came into my life and,
against all odds,managed to break the curse and set me free.
Thank you, we will provide any help we can provide to assist you.
What else you want to know?
Where did the Beast come from

It’s been weeks, Belle. Not a single word from those I sent.\.
The beast sits on my throne, mocking me with every day that passes.
I know, my love. But we must have faith.
\|The right help will come—patience is our ally now.
You are right, anxiety won't do anything now.\|
Only if I was strong enought to...\^
Adam, I don't need you to do it for me.\|
If this is how our story ends, then so be it.
Nevermind, It's useless to talk it now.
This roast Pig is just awesome!.
Just finish your meal, we are in hurry.
You might want to be careful around that couple. \|
I’ve heard rumors they’re just tricking folks into feeding the beast
Feeding the beast? What do you mean?
They lure in adventurers with tales of gold and glory, \.
but no one who’s gone after that beast has ever returned.\|
Some say it’s all a ruse to keep the beast sated while they sit in comfort.
But why would they do that? \.
Maybe they’re hoping to keep it alive so they can continue their charade.
\|Or perhaps they have their own deal with the beast—some twisted pact.
You might want to be careful around that couple. \|

But why would they do that? \.
Maybe they’re hoping to keep it alive so they can continue their charade.
\|Or perhaps they have their own deal with the beast—some twisted pact.
What a nice day for a meal.
Did you hear? They say the beast is no ordinary creature.
\.Some claim it’s a guardian of the castle, bound by an ancient curse.
And I heard that couple never really owned that castle.
They just waltzed in and started spinning tales to trick the gullible!
